Body: Possible Duplicate:  Suggestions for syncing data to someone besides Google? Funambol?  As I understand, the Android phone can only sync with Google (GMail, Google Calendar, etc.) out of the box. I can imagine corporate users having a problem with their data residing on Google's servers — despite their "do no evil" credo.Is there any Android application that lets you sync with the desktop (either Linux or Windows) or corporate server applications (think Exchange)?
Title: How to sync an Android phone with anything other than Google?

history.Text: As I understand, the Android phone can only sync with Google (GMail, Google Calendar, etc.) out of the box. I can imagine corporate users having a problem with their data residing on Google's servers — despite their "do no evil" credo.Is there any Android application that lets you sync with the desktop (either Linux or Windows) or corporate server applications (think Exchange)?
